posts.post: Looks like everything works so far. I am still not satisfied about the design though. Maybe I will work on it later.
The  profile pictures are giving me a hard time. The fact that they are given to me in different sizes makes it even harder for me to scale appropriately.
But on a less serious note. Game of Thrones season 8 was definitely trash. They butchered the whole series with that final season. Poor dragon queen.
